It wasn’t easy to stand and balance the scooter. ‘What the heck?’ I mumbled. Meanwhile, my kid and wife effortlessly found their groove and zoomed ahead while I lagged behind, still trying to figure out the whole standing-and-scooting thing. It took me a while to get the hang of it, but soon enough, I was cruising confidently, feeling a sense of pride and accomplishment. The scenery was truly breathtaking—rolling green meadows, vibrant flowers, majestic mountains as our backdrop, and a smooth asphalt path beneath our wheels. Pure bliss, even if my scooter seemed intent on setting a new land speed record downhill! Trottibike Experience Trottibike Scooter Mishap As I zoomed ahead on the scooter, overtaking first my wife and then my kid, the thrill of the ride took me back to carefree childhood days in Kanpur. Memories flooded back from 1995, when I was my kid’s age, biking around town without a care in the world. But just as I was nostalgic, I realized I had left those times far behind.
